verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came הַזִּפִים֙ <S%H2130><s%> haz-zi-Fim And the Ziphites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, unto Saul הַגִּבְעָ֖תָה <S%H1390><s%> hag-giv-'A-tah to Gibeah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo is not דָוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּר֙ <S%H5641><s%> mis-tat-Ter hide בְּגִבְעַ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> be-giv-'At himself in the hill הַחֲכִילָ֔ה <S%H2444><s%> ha-cha-chi-Lah, of Hachilah עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al above פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei [which is] before הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <S%H3452><s%> hay-shi-Mon. desert

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, Then Saul וַיֵּ֙רֶד֙ <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red and went down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mid-bar- to the wilderness זִ֔יף <S%H2128><s%> Zif, of Ziph וְאִתּ֛וֹ <S%H854><s%> ve-'it-To for שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-shet- having three אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men בְּחוּרֵ֣י <S%H970><s%> be-chu-Rei young יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh with him to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-bar- in the wilderness זִֽיף׃ <S%H2128><s%> Zif. of Ziph

וַיִּ֨חַן <S%H2583><s%> vai-Yi-chan pitched שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And Saul בְּגִבְעַ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> be-giv-'At in the hill הַחֲכִילָ֗ה <S%H2444><s%> ha-cha-chi-Lah, of Hachilah אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei which [is] before הַיְשִׁימֹ֖ן <S%H3452><s%> hay-shi-Mon Jeshimon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside הַדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-Da-rech; by the way וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid But David יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev abode בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar, in the wilderness וַיַּ֕רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and he saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> va came שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul that Saul אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav after הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Ba-rah. him into the wilderness

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach therefore sent out דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David מְרַגְּלִ֑ים <S%H7270><s%> me-rag-ge-Lim; spies וַיֵּ֕דַע <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-da' and understood כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> va was come שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul that Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about נָכֽוֹן׃ <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon. in very deed

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וַיָּבֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּקוֹם֮ <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-kOm to the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after חָנָה־ <S%H2583><s%> cha-nah- had pitched שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it שָׁאוּל֒ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul where Saul וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar beheld דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, and David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-kOm the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after שָֽׁכַב־ <S%H7901><s%> sha-chav- lay שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, where Saul וְאַבְנֵ֥ר <S%H74><s%> ve-'av-Ner and Abner בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נֵ֖ר <S%H5369><s%> ner of Ner שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- the captain צְבָא֑וֹ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'O; of his host וְשָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul and Saul שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> sho-Chev lay בַּמַּעְגָּ֔ל <S%H4570><s%> bam-ma'-Gal, in the trench וְהָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people חֹנִ֥ים <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nim pitched; סְבִיבֹתֹו se-vi-vo-tov כסְבִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Tav. place ק

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an Then answered דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲחִימֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> 'a-chi-Me-lech to Ahimelech הַחִתִּ֗י <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti, the Hittite וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אֲבִישַׁ֨י <S%H52><s%> 'a-vi-Shai and to Abishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צְרוּיָ֜ה <S%H6870><s%> tze-ru-Yah of Zeruiah אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av to Joab לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who יֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red Who will go down אִתִּ֛י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti for אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul with me to Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh; army וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲבִישַׁ֔י <S%H52><s%> 'a-vi-Shai, Abishai אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> 'e-Red I will go down עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came דָוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid So David וַאֲבִישַׁ֥י׀ <S%H52><s%> va-'a-vi-Shai and Abishai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am to the people לַיְלָה֒ <S%H3915><s%> lay-Lah by night וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, and behold Saul שֹׁכֵ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> sho-Chev lay יָשֵׁן֙ <S%H3463><s%> ya-Shen sleeping בַּמַּעְגָּ֔ל <S%H4570><s%> bam-ma'-Gal, within the trench וַחֲנִית֥וֹ <S%H2595><s%> va-cha-ni-To and his spear מְעוּכָֽה־ <S%H4600><s%> me-'u-chah- stuck בָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz in the ground; מְרַאֲשֹׁתֹו me-ra-'a-sho-tov כמְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav; bolster קוְאַבְנֵ֣ר <S%H74><s%> ve-'av-Ner but Abner וְהָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am, and the people שֹׁכְבִ֖ים <S%H7901><s%> sho-che-Vim lay; סְבִיבֹתֹו se-vi-vo-tov כסְבִיבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Tav. place קס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֲבִישַׁי֙ <S%H52><s%> 'a-vi-Shai Abishai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, to David סִגַּ֨ר <S%H5462><s%> sig-Gar hath delivered אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אוֹיִבְךָ֖ <S%H341><s%> o-yiv-Cha thine enemy בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha; into thine hand וְעַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now אַכֶּ֨נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> 'ak-Ken-nu now therefore let me smite נָ֜א <S%H4994><s%> na please בַּחֲנִ֤ית <S%H2595><s%> ba-cha-Nit him I pray thee with the spear וּבָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> u-va-'A-retz even to the earth פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> Pa-'am stroke אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat, one וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אֶשְׁנֶ֖ה <S%H8138><s%> 'esh-Neh and I will not [smite] him the second time לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲבִישַׁ֖י <S%H52><s%> 'a-vi-Shai to Abishai אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּשְׁחִיתֵ֑הוּ <S%H7843><s%> tash-chi-Te-hu; Destroy כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi who שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach him not for who can stretch forth יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand בִּמְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> bim-Shi-ach anointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh against the LORD'S וְנִקָּֽה׃ <S%H5352><s%> ve-nik-Kah. and be guiltless פ Peh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, furthermore [As] the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD יִגָּפֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5062><s%> yig-ga-Fen-nu; shall smite אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or יוֹמ֤וֹ <S%H3117><s%> yo-Mo him or his day יָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo shall come וָמֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met, to die א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> vam-mil-cha-Mah into battle יֵרֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red or he shall descend וְנִסְפָּֽה׃ <S%H5595><s%> ve-nis-Pah. and perish

חָלִ֤ילָה <S%H2486><s%> cha-Li-lah forbid לִּי֙ li מֵֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, The LORD מִשְּׁלֹ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> mish-she-Lo-ach that I should stretch forth יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand בִּמְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H4899><s%> bim-Shi-ach anointed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; against the LORD'S וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Ve-'at-tah now קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- but I pray thee take נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na please אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֲנִ֜ית <S%H2595><s%> ha-cha-Nit thou now the spear אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after; מְרַאֲשֹׁתֹו me-ra-'a-sho-tov כמְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֛יו <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav bolster קוְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> tzap-Pa-chat and the cruse הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim of water וְנֵ֥לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> ve-Ne-la-chah go לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid So David אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֲנִ֜ית <S%H2595><s%> ha-cha-Nit the spear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צַפַּ֤חַת <S%H6835><s%> tzap-Pa-chat and the cruse הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim of water מֵרַאֲשֹׁתֵ֣י <S%H7226><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tei bolster שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, from Saul's וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein no רֹאֶה֩ <S%H7200><s%> ro-'Eh and no man saw וְאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein one יוֹדֵ֜עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' [it] nor knew וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein nor מֵקִ֗יץ <S%H6974><s%> me-Kitz, [it] neither awaked כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> chul-Lam were all יְשֵׁנִ֔ים <S%H3462><s%> ye-she-Nim, grow old כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki because תַּרְדֵּמַ֣ת <S%H8639><s%> tar-de-Mat because a deep sleep יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, from the LORD נָפְלָ֖ה <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lah was fallen עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. and
